abstracts.cdata!:
The Fisheries Development Project
            comprises: the first stage of a long term program to develop
            fisheries production in Tanzania. It would support the
            establishment and development of commercial fisheries at
            three marine and one inland centre on Lake Tanganyika; the
            development of a pilot village fisheries program and the
            provision of fish transport facilities on Lake Tanganyika,
            studies on marketing and pollution, future project
            preparation and the provision of related technical services.
